comments.author: cedric.corazza@wanadoo.fr
comments.text: I noticed that there is no warning about obsolete files in en-US repository in the l10n dashboard: it remains green instead of being orange to warn localizers.
comments.creator: cedric.corazza@wanadoo.fr
comments.raw_text: I noticed that there is no warning about obsolete files in en-US repository in the l10n dashboard: it remains green instead of being orange to warn localizers.

comments.creator: l10n@mozilla.com
comments.author: l10n@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
I've originally stayed away from this because I can't really say which files in the repo won't be used, as that depends on app.

Things aren't simpler today now that we have overlaying modules, with browser and browser/branding/official, but I can probably assume that we only have such an overlay within one l10n.ini.
comments.text:

comments.raw_text: Axel, I guess the process has changed since then and this not relevant anymore? Should we RESOLVED NOT FIXED/INVALID this bug? Thanks.
